content: this is an amigurumi crochet pattern in english language to create your own crocheted dachshund skill beginner materials and supplies this toy was made of 100% mercerized cotton yarn 50g/125m schachenmayr catania originals size of the toy crocheted with the recommended yarn is approximately 6 5 cm long 5 cm tall fiber filling scissors big tapestry needle for sewing details together hook size 2 5 big tapestry needle for sewing details together scissors pins if you have any question about this pattern please feel free to contact me happy crocheting
